name: 4G Switcher LTE Only
description:
4G LTE Switcher: Force LTE only helps you 2g 3g 4g network mode change to boost your internet speed anywhere. If you have no option of 4g LTE only mode in your device, this switch network app will provide force LTE only feature for you. It allows you to refresh your network mode with 4G LTE signal booster for android. If you feel your internet speed is slow then you can select 4G LTE only mode in just one click. 2g 3g 4g LTE feature enables you to switch between different network modes and select one of the best for your device.

This 4G switcher LTE only app shows you hidden settings menu. It includes other feature like mobile network info by which you can see details of your sim card. In this 4G LTE switcher app, function Wi-Fi settings will provide you information about the using wifi in device. Now you can easily check your apps usage like how much time you spent on app everyday with Force LTE only. With a app usage monitor you can control your device usage time.
